name: Pixel Forge
description:
Gameplay

Run your own pixelated blacksmith forge and meet your customers' needs!

From smelting ore, to sharpening blades, get a taste of all the steps required to create a sword.

Use different metals to create stronger swords according to what your customers need.

Race against time as you attempt to make as much money as you can in a single day.

Controls

WASD - Move

SHIFT - Drop items/Place items

ENTER - Pick up Items
